name: Venom Drake
description: The Venom Drake is a large dragon with powerful physique and deadly poison, known for its sleek scales that allow it to camouflage in nature.
memorable: Its potent poison can incapacitate foes, making it a formidable opponent in battles.
goals: Typically seeks to incapacitate and damage foes using its toxic abilities.
relations: May serve other chaotic creatures or serve as an independent predator within its environment.
environment: Found in natural terrains that allow for effective camouflage.
strengths: Has high strength and constitution, making it robust in combat with potent poison and agile movement.
weaknesses: Low charisma suggests difficulty in social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack feature allows it to bite and claw or spit venom, with attacks dealing both piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Venom Breath unleashes a large line of poison damage potentially incapacitating multiple creatures.
senses: Possesses keen smell, granting advantage on perception checks related to smell.
skills: Good perception skills due to a high wisdom score.
additional_information: Can camouflage effectively in natural terrain.
Multiattack capability makes it highly dangerous in combat.
Maintains a solid AC with natural armor.
test_queries: deadly large dragon with venom attacks
agile dragon known for venomous capabilities
